T02D3479:129a-1: tsanda ma h'a ro sha na s'a dha nam /
T02D3479:129a-3: gtum po chen po'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3479:129a-4: gtum po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3479:129a-5: sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas 'dir stong pa nyid du bsgoms nas /
T02D3479:129a-6: de nas padma dkar po'i steng du nyi ma la
T02D3479:129a-7: h'um yig nag po yongs su gyur pa las bcom
T02D3479:129a-8: ldan 'das gtum po chen po zar ma'i me tog
T02D3479:129a-9: lta bu gzhan gyis mi g-yo ba zhal gcig pa
T02D3479:129a-10: phyag gnyis pa / zur gyis gzigs pa /
T02D3479:129a-12: mi bzad pa'i zhal chen po /
T02D3479:129a-13: rin po che'i dbu rgyan can /
T02D3479:129a-14: mche bas ma mchu mnan pa /
T02D3479:129b-0: mgo bo'i phreng bas dbu brgyan @129b pa ;
T02D3479:129b-2: phyag g-yas na ral gri bsnams shing phyag g-yon pa zhags pa dang sdigs mdzub thugs kar gnas pa'o //
T02D3479:129b-3: sbrul dkar pos se ral kha mdzad pa /
T02D3479:129b-4: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can /
T02D3479:129b-5: rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D3479:129b-6: zhabs g-yon pa sa la reg pa /
T02D3479:129b-7: zhabs g-yas pa cung zhig bteg pa /
T02D3479:129b-8: nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba can gyi bdag nyid du rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02D3479:129b-9: dam tshig sems dpa' dang ye shes sems dpa' bsgom
T02D3479:129b-10: pa sngon du 'gro bas mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan
T02D3479:129b-12: de nas bzlas pa'i sngags ni aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat /
